title: Electrolysis
creator_credit: McGraw-Hill Films and MGM International Films
brief_description: Standard electrolysis equipment is set up and operated to demonstrate the conduction of electricity through a liquid. The electrical connections are made and the process takes place; oxygen and hydrogen ions are formed and the liquid conducts a current of electricity.
